name: Feishu Media & STT
description: Audio speech-to-text (Feishu native + Whisper) and media payload utilities for feishu channel messages

sttProvider.description: STT provider: feishu (native API), whisper (external service or local CLI), auto (try whisper first then feishu)

whisperUrl.description: Optional Whisper HTTP service URL. Falls back to OPENCLAW_WHISPER_URL env var or local CLI

whisperScript.description: Path to local whisper_stt.py script. Falls back to OPENCLAW_WHISPER_SCRIPT env var

sttTimeoutMs.description: Timeout for STT HTTP requests in milliseconds
